reviews.review_msg: Michelle is an amazing professor. Everything was laid out in rubrics on how you were graded. We had two field trips during the course, which were great experiences. We also had one bonus assignment, where she would drop your lowest grade. Participation was based on whether you showed up to the in-class portion of the hybrid class. Would take again!

She is so nice and gives great feedback. Her lectures are structured and she has great questions to discuss about the texts you read, which themselves are interesting. She does a good job in engaging everyone and honestly even if you didn't read the text, just show up to class and you'll still get the marks.

Says attendance is mandatory but it's really not. She is super easy going and is lenient towards deadlines as long as you communicate that with her. Her lectures are straightforward and welcome discussion. Except when you answer she doesn't really give a response, she just nods her head and moves on to the next person. Generous marking
Margaret is really interested in the subject matter, is very fair when grading essays and presentations, and gives good feedback on assignments. Would definitely take another class from her!
